Action.author: zhaochy
Action.body: ~dongming it seems you are config your channel with {color:#d04437}Capabilities.Application: V1_1: true{color}. Can you set this to {color:#d04437}V1_2: true{color} and {color:#d04437}V1_1: false{color} and try again?

Action.author: dongming
Action.body: ~zhaochy after set V1.2 as true, the issue is not seen.Â Thanks
